Desc.entry: Open to any Christian who enjoys singing, an ability to read music is not required. Term-time membership for students is welcomed. A regular commitment to attendance is expected as far as possible. The repertoire includes music from the Renaissance to more contemporary composers from Britain and the USA.

Langs.entry: Dutch, French, German, Spanish, and a variety of African languages

ContactName.entry: Philip Jakob, Director of Music, Cathedral and Diocese of Hallam

ProvisionPlace.entry: Roman Catholic Cathedral of St Marie

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Thurs 7.30-9.15pm (choir practice), Sunday Services at 10am (Morning Prayer) & 10.30am (Mass)
